Generation IV.Diamond: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.
Generation IV.Pearl: Folklore has it that on moonless nights, this Pokémon will make people see horrific nightmares.
Generation IV.Platinum: To protect itself, it afflicts those around it with nightmares. However, it means no harm.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of a new moon.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Folklore has it that on moonless nights, this Pokémon will make people see horrific nightmares.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: On a moonless night, a strange incident occurred in which every one of a village's inhabitants suffered nightmares. The villagers attested that Darkrai appeared before them in these nightmares.
